about.description: Furumaru is a live commerce platform.
about.firstPointTitle: Lots of fresh products directly from the production area
about.firstPointDescription: We deliver fresh agricultural, livestock, and other products directly from 'hometowns'. We also carry many seasonal foods and local specialties, so you are sure to make new discoveries and have unexpected encounters.
about.secondPointTitle: Live commerce to organize regional marches
about.secondPointDescription: Coordinators rooted in the community select products and distribute marche. The appeal of the products and the thoughts of the producers are conveyed in real time. In addition, you can enjoy shopping anytime through archived feeds and product searches.
about.thirdPointTitle: You can ask questions directly to the producer, so it's easy to imagine what it would be like.
about.thirdPointDescription: You can ask questions in the chat room while watching the live streaming, so you can enjoy shopping as if you were actually at the marché. You can also check the details of the products through the video, which are difficult to convey through photographs alone.
about.forthPointTitle: Save on shipping costs by shipping items from the same region together!
about.forthPointDescription: Furumaru shipping charges are added per marche, not per item. If you shop at the same marche, you will not be charged additional shipping fees no matter how many items you buy as long as they fit in the same box.
about.forthPointLinkText: For more information about shipping charges, click here.

complete.completeMessage: A confirmation email has been sent to the email address you registered, so please check it. if you do not receive an email, please contact us here and include your order number above. you can also check your order details from your order history on your account page.
